application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - London Plane tree - rear parking area on the right-hand side - reduce the two branches overhanging car parking space byapproximately 3-4m, cutting to the first growth point on both branches, in an attempt to prevent bird droppings on the adjacent parked vehicles.  T2 - Overhanging Oak branch, growing from neighbouring property to the rear (4/4a, Ravenscourt Square) to reduce the branch back to the boundary in an attempt to prevent leaves and bird droppings on the adjacent parked vehicles.  T3 - Lime Tree growing in the rear car park - to crown reduce by approximately 2-3m, lifting the lower canopy by 1m to prevent it from obscuring the security cameras which monitor the parking area behind.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
